description:
Upgraded with zonal Koroyd protection, the newest Persist is safer than ever. They say cool heads prevail, they probably regularly crush their PRs too. With 21 strategically placed vents the Persist helmet helps keep you cool when you put the hammer down.

  • Koroyd® sections absorb more impact than traditional EPS alone
  • MIPS® technology (Multi-directional Impact Protection System) reduces rotational forces in an oblique impact. An inner shell sandwiched between the foam and the padding reduces the rotational torque on the skull
  • AirEvac™ system pulls warm air away from your sunglasses for reduced fogging
  • Pass-through channels to store glasses on the front
  • 21 vents
  • Quick drying liner wicks away moisture
  • VaporFit™ dial adjustment system offers 270-degrees fit adjustment for dialling in the perfect fit
name: Smith Persist MIPS Helmet - Unisex
